mapper.select: select a.a_no,a_nick,a_img from study s, study_in si, account a where s.s_no=si.s_no and a.a_no=si.a_no and s.s_no=#{s_no} and s_leader='1'
select a_no from account where a_email = #{a_email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (a_no, a_nick, a_name, a_gender, a_email, a_img, a_regdate)VALUES (ACCOUNT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{a_name}, #{a_name}, 'none', #{a_email}, 'default.png', SYSDATE)
